sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
flicks
, se na lepem hitro premakne.

seg.quote: Its tongue flicks in and out of its tiny mouth.
...a quick upward flick of the arm.

sense.def:
To flick something away
pomeni nekaj odstraniti s hitrim gibom roke ali prsta.

seg.quote: He flicked the dust from his suit.
She sat there, flicking ash into the ashtray.

sense.def:
To flick something
pomeni držati en konec nečesa, na primer biča ali brisače, in hitro premakniti roko navzgor in naprej, da se premakne tudi drugi konec.

seg.quote: He flicked their bare arms with a tea towel.
He gave a flick of the whip.

sense.def:
To flick something
pomeni tudi nekaj ostro zadeti z nohtom, tako da noht pritisnemo ob palec in ga na lepem spustimo.

seg.quote: I flicked the hollow door with my finger.

sense.def:
To flick a switch or catch
pomeni močno pritisniti na stikalo ali kljuko, da se premakne.

To flick through a book or magazine
pomeni hitro obračati liste knjige ali revije.

seg.quote: He flicked through the passport, not understanding a word.
